title: 113-2學期新舊生註冊須知Summary of the registration procedures in the 113-2 semester
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 教務處註冊組 - 羅靖雯 - chage2000.tw@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6115
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 113-2學期新舊生註冊須知Summary of the registration procedures in the 113-2 semester
日期： Thu, 26 Dec 2024 14:35:06 +0800
附檔： 附件一-113-2舊生註冊重要摘錄.pdf (167 KB)   附件二-113-2舊生註冊須知.pdf (433 KB)   附件三-113-2二月提前入學新生及寒轉生註冊須知.pdf (572 KB)   Summary of the registration procedures in the 113-2 semester.pdf (4 MB)   
各位助理大家好

113學年度第2學期註冊程序重要摘錄如下:

一、本學期全校註冊日為114年2月17日（週一），請同學於期限前完成繳費（或辦妥就學貸款）並於【網路註冊系統】更新學籍資料(每學期均要更新)；逾期未完成者，依學則規定勒令退學。

(一)繳交學雜費：

1、繳費單下載時間自114年1月20日（週一）起

(1)嚮應節能減碳本校不寄發繳費單，繳費單開放後，請同學至本校首頁學雜費專區【臺灣銀行學雜費入口網】自行下載。

(2)本校代收類別代號如下，請依繳納項目分別登入：

a.繳納註冊學雜費＆加選學分費、學生會費、住宿補繳費用等，請輸入代號111332。

b.查詢112學年度(含)前之學生會費&住宿補繳等其他相關費用，請輸入代號111942。

              (3)繳費單列印流程請參考本校首頁學雜費專區【繳費單列印流程之教學畫面】。

2、繳費期間：114年1月20日～2月17日

3、繳費方式：臺灣銀行、郵局、便利超商、信用卡、ATM、網路銀行轉帳及行動支付工具等，詳內容請參閱附件。

(二)網路註冊：

請於114年2月4日～2月17日止，至【網路註冊系統】確認或更新個人資料後，點選「更新資料確認」鍵；賃居校外者，請於系統中第10項填報校外住宿地址，以利緊急狀況之聯繫。

二、查詢註冊情形及列印在學證明：請於114年2月17日（週一）上午9點後，至【電子學習履歷系統】重要資訊中查詢當學期繳費、就學貸款及網路註冊情形，完成註冊手續者，即可在系統中「列印當學期在學證明」。

三、本校不寄發當學期成績通知單，學生及家長可自行上網查詢或申請，詳細內容請參閱附件。

四、詳細註冊內容已公告在本校【教務網頁公告事項】中。

 

Dear all,

Here is a summary of the registration procedures for students in the 113-2 semester. Detailed registration instructions have been posted in the announcements section on the website of the Academic Affairs Office at NDHU:

 

I.      Students are required to pay tuition and fees before February 17th , 2025 (Monday) and update their status information in the【Online Registration System】.Failure to do so will result in the inability to continue schooling.

A.    Pay tuition and fees:

1.     Payment period: January 20th ~ February 17th , 2025

2.     Students are encouraged to download payment slips from the Tuition and Miscellaneous Fees section on the website of the Bank of Taiwan. The school doesn’t provide printed payment slips as we support energy conservation and carbon reduction.
Access the payment slip download via the following path: NDHU's homepage → Tuition and Miscellaneous Fees Area → Tuition and Miscellaneous Fees section on the Bank of Taiwan's website →【Bill Inquire (previously referred to as 'Student Login') 】

3.     The tips of login:

a.      Collection category :

(1)  For tuition and fees ,credit fees, student union fees and accommodation back payment fees: 111332

(2) To inquire about student union fees, accommodation back payment and other related fees for the academic year 2023 and earlier:111942

b.     ID card number: ARC number

c.      Student number

d.     Identifier: Birthday applicable for the Republic of China era (in the format YYYMMDD, totaling 7 digits). For example, May 3, 1981 please enter 0700503

4.     After logging in, ensure the correct payment slip is selected for payment, then click 'Search'. Afterwards, archive it (with your ARC number) and print it on A4 paper.
If downloading is inconvenient, you can contact the Cashier Section of the General Affairs Office to request assistance. (Tel: 03-8906366, Fax: 03-8900133)

5.     Payment methods encompass Bank of Taiwan, post offices, convenience stores, credit cards, ATM, and online banking transfers (select 'Payment'). Furthermore, mobile payment tools like TAIWAN PAY, iPASS MONEY, JKO PAY, and EASY WALLET are accepted, with handling fees contingent upon the displayed amount on each method's respective payment page.
(Please refer to the tutorial on NDHU homepage → Tuition and Miscellaneous Fees Area → 【Teaching Screen for the Payment Slip Printing Process】)

B.    Online registration:
Between February 4th to February 17th, 2025, please log in the 【Online Registration System】 to confirm or update your personal information, and click「Update Information」.

II.    To check the registration status and print the student certificate:
Students who have completed the registration procedures (including tuition payment and online registration) can access the 【e-Portfolio】 to review the list and print their student certificate.

III.  Students can check the scores or apply transcripts online by themselves.

A.    Check the scores: 【e-Portfolio】→ Score Query

B.    Requesting transcripts:

Students can print transcripts themselves at Room 102 on the 1st floor, outside Room 401 on the 4th floor of the administration building, and next to the service desk on the first floor of the library.

C.    Requesting Ranking Certificates:

Please access the 【Student Online Application Document System】 to submit your application. We recommend using ATM transfer or online banking for faster payment processing.

 

 

教務處註冊組

Registry Division,Office of Academic Affairs

03-8906112~6116
